title: Marine and Coastal
blurb: Information regarding Australia's seafloor, coasts and estuaries. As an island continent, Australia has sovereign rights over a vast area of ocean and seafloor along with the fishery, mineral, and petroleum resources found in this zone. Coasts and estuaries form the dynamic, transition zone between the land and the sea and provide Australians  many economic, social and environmental benefits.

headerConfig.title: Applying geoscience to Australia's most important challenges

maps.title: Bathymetry
maps.previewDescription: Visualisation of the highest resolution bathymetric data available for download on the Geoscience Australia website.

maps.title: Geology, Geomorphology and Geophysics of the Northwest Shelf
maps.previewDescription: A compilation of  marine and coastal geological,  geomorphological and geophysical data over the Northwest Shelf.

maps.title: Marine and Coastal Data
maps.previewDescription: A compilation of national marine and coastal datasets managed and distributed by Geoscience Australia.

maps.title: Environmental Management Data
maps.previewDescription: A compilation of significant biological and environmental management web services and datasets managed and distributed by the Department of Environment and CSIRO.
